column5: Our flagship masters course prepares you for a career as an economist in finance, consultancy, the public sector or in research.MSc Economics, our flagship masters course, is flexible, allowing you to choose modules in economics or finance whilst also giving you core analytical skills.This course prepares you for a career as an economist in finance, consultancy, the public sector or in research.ModulesA selection of modules are available each year - some examples are below. There may be changes before you start your course. From May of the year of entry, formal programme regulations will be available in our Programme Regulations Finder.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
